text: Nelly Beatriz Bonnet (11 December 1930 – 19 February 2020) was an Argentine actress and comedian. She acted on stage and screen. Her movie credits include Mansedumbre (1953), Canario rojo (1955), Novia para dos (1956) and El Profesor erótico (1976). Bonnet was born in Gualeguay, Entre Ríos. She died due to Alzheimer's disease on 19 February 2020 in Buenos Aires. She was 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 deaths Category:1930 births Category:Argentine comedians Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Argentina Category:Argentine stage actors
title: Beatriz Bonnet
